transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello sir.
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Haan ji sir bataiye bataiye.
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Sir mai Pragati baat kar rahi hu abhi India mart se aapke call pe.
Customer: Haan haan haan madam. Sir aapko call receive karte waqt cut gaya aapka call just bataiye.
Executive: Chalega chalega.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Customer: Mai bol raha tha mera ek aur mere ek aur company me India mart ka subscription lena hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To uske liye kya beneficial hai ki kya discount de sakte hai aap best to best ya kya?
Executive: Sir GST vagera sara ka sara same to same rahega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: GST vagera jo bhi papers vagera hai sare ke sare same to same rahenge.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek aapko.
Customer: Nahi alag alag alag alag alag alag alag rahega.
Executive: Vahi mai puch rahi hu aap se kisko open karna hai.
Customer: Mera ek aur firm hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Usme karna hai aapka pura product alag hai.
Customer: Haan pura product alag hai usme.
Executive: Haan. Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir mai iske regarding ek baar apne manager se aapko discussion karke aapko five minutes ke andar call karti hu thik hai sir.
Customer: Pragati mai ye soch raha hu agar aapko ye lead milta hai to kuch discount vagera kuch rehta hai to mai aapko bypass kar matlab aapko de deta hu.
Executive: Mai samajh gayi hu sir vahi usi ke regarding mai discussion kar lu ek baar hai na.
Customer: Chalega na chalega.
Executive: Haan vahi vahi isiliye mai soch rahi hu ki ek baar puch lo clear kar le sir hai na.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Thik hai sir ok ek second. Aaram se madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a subscription for another company.

- Wants to know about discounts and benefits.



Resolution:

- Executive will discuss with manager and call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in five minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, discount, benefits
